channel.description: [center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/TIVnD.png[/img] [QUOTE]Homepage: Exilation.com Forums: Exilation.com/forums < IPB Playnow: Exilation.com/playnow/playnow.htm[/QUOTE] Lagg is not experienced in Exilation! [img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/2315591089.png[/img] Features: - Exilation Exilation is a Server that have been up since 2011, We have had some downtimes but we are up again trying to get our playbase to the top!, Exilation is a 718 Loading 740, We are the most Unique "RSPS" Out there. With Exilation you will most likely never ever get Bored, We have tons of minigames, Bosses!. 99% Of the skills working, And MUCH more! Friendly Community And Helpful Staff!. We also have Licensed IPB & Custom Homepage. We will do everything to make you satisfied. So why not joining us?. If you want to play a high revision private server then you have came to the right place!. PvP/Pking: - We have a PERFECTED Pvp sysem - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking - Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds) - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP PvM: - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon) - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows & More... PvP And PvM: - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers) Miscellaneous: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - Flawless Music & Sound system - Perfect XP counter Features: PulseScape server: - PulseScape 704 is a economy based server, we also have a unquie point system called pulses that can be used to obtain the best items in game(Chaotics, PvP Armour and weapons, And much more). But do not worry because this server is packed full of content and bosses and skilling and much much more! PvP/Pking: - We have a PERFECTED Pvp sysem - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking - Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds) - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP PvM: - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon) - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows & More... PvP And PvM: - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers) Miscellaneous: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - Flawless Music & Sound system - Perfect XP counter [/center] 100% Slayer system with rewards [img]http://i.imgur.com/toYP0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/c19N9.png[/img] 100% userpanel with teleports[/img] 100% Bandos & new godwars ( ALL PRAYER ALTARS WORKING) [img]http://i.imgur.com/vtUJE.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BcGuq.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pRDvm.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hPDpZ.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lskli.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Iik3f.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AjQgT.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2CorE.jpg[/img] Teleports: http://i.imgur.com/KwMHi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cS4rP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yCN2W.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qw3Bs.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IYfdp.png[/img] Loyality Points (Online Gametime) [img]http://i.imgur.com/r8s6S.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZEMf1.png[/img] More trainings teleports: [img]http://i.imgur.com/rPzYX.jpg[/img] Polypore ( with rewards) [img]http://i.imgur.com/TBnUR.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oC5Mz.png[/img] Rev's 100% (in wild) [img]http://i.imgur.com/oC5Mz.png[/img] SKILLING: [img]http://i.imgur.com/DYYVV.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9yrDO.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2J0rb.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2J0rb.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rThkK.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ic3x3.jpg[/img] [img]http://[img]http://i.imgur.com/IQSaI.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fUuUI.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/L2ZlL.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4zatl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/w5xn3.png[/img] < WOAH 100% SCROLL CREATION? [img]http://i.imgur.com/R7XoV.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VyMtH.jpg[/img] Monsters & Misc [img]http://i.imgur.com/EZRdR.jpg[/img] Squeal of fortune & money pouch [img]http://i.imgur.com/QNXg3.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MVJoB.png[/img] barrows [img]http://i.imgur.com/qllv6.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Exilation742 || Experience The Bestt || Right before EOC came
item.dc:creator: @m_i_l_k m i l k
item.description:
@m_i_l_k wrote:

[center]
[center]

[QUOTE]Homepage: Exilation.com
Forums: Exilation.com/forums < IPB
Playnow: Exilation.com/playnow/playnow.htm[/QUOTE]
Lagg is not experienced in Exilation!

Features:

  • Exilation
    Exilation is a Server that have been up since 2011, We have had some downtimes but we are up again trying to get our playbase to the top!, Exilation is a 718 Loading 740, We are the most Unique “RSPS” Out there. With Exilation you will most likely never ever get Bored, We have tons of minigames, Bosses!. 99% Of the skills working, And MUCH more! Friendly Community And Helpful Staff!. We also have Licensed IPB & Custom Homepage. We will do everything to make you satisfied. So why not joining us?. If you want to play a high revision private server then you have came to the right place!.
    PvP/Pking:
  • We have a PERFECTED Pvp sysem
  • We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking
  • Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds)
  • Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more.
  • Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP
    PvM:
  • King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects
  • Tormented Demons with all 3 switches
  • Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless)
  • Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon)
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Barrows & More…
    PvP And PvM:
  • Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless
  • Switching better than RS
  • Full Summoning!!
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)
    Miscellaneous:
  • All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons!
  • Quick Chat 100%
  • Flawless Music & Sound system
  • Perfect XP counter
    Features:
    PulseScape server:
  • PulseScape 704 is a economy based server, we also have a unquie point system called pulses that can be used to obtain the best items in game(Chaotics, PvP Armour and weapons, And much more). But do not worry because this server is packed full of content and bosses and skilling and much much more!
    PvP/Pking:
  • We have a PERFECTED Pvp sysem
  • We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking
  • Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds)
  • Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more.
  • Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP
    PvM:
  • King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects
  • Tormented Demons with all 3 switches
  • Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless)
  • Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon)
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Barrows & More…
    PvP And PvM:
  • Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless
  • Switching better than RS
  • Full Summoning!!
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)
    Miscellaneous:
  • All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons!
  • Quick Chat 100%
  • Flawless Music & Sound system
  • Perfect XP counter
    [/center]
    100% Slayer system with rewards
